Package com.ktzvhad.rents.controller

Class WebController

java.lang.Object
com.ktzvhad.rents.controller.WebController
@Controller public class WebController extends Object
The WebController class handles various web-related operations such as authentication, user registration, password reset, and retrieving user data.

  • Method Details

    • viewEncodedData

      @GetMapping("/view-encoded-data/{userId}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'SUPERUSER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> viewEncodedData(@PathVariable Long userId)
      View encoded data for a specific user identified by userId.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose encoded data is to be viewed.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the decoded data.

      Permissions:

      • ADMIN
      • SUPERUSER

    • authenticate

      @PostMapping("/authenticate") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> authenticate(@RequestBody RegistrationRequest registrationRequest)
      Authenticate a user based on the provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      registrationRequest - the request containing the username and password.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the authentication token and user roles.

    • registerNewUser

      @PostMapping("/register") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'SUPERUSER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> registerNewUser(@RequestBody RegistrationRequest registrationRequest)
      Register a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      registrationRequest - the registration request containing user details.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the registration.

      Permissions:

      • ADMIN
      • SUPERUSER

    • logoutUser

      @PostMapping("/logout") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> logoutUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Logout the current user by invalidating their token.
      Parameters:
      request - the HTTP request containing the token.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the logout operation.

    • updateUserData

      @PutMapping("/userdata") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserData> updateUserData(@RequestBody String newData, Principal principal)
      Update user data for the currently authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      newData - the new user data to be updated.
      principal - the Principal object representing the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated user data.

    • passwordResetRequest

      @PostMapping("/password-reset-request") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> passwordResetRequest(@RequestParam String email)
      Request a password reset for the specified email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address for which the password reset is requested.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the request.

    • resetPassword

      @PostMapping("/reset-password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> resetPassword(@RequestParam String token, @RequestParam String oldPassword, @RequestParam String newPassword)
      Reset the password using the provided token and new password.
      Parameters:
      token - the password reset token.
      oldPassword - the user's old password.
      newPassword - the new password to be set.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the password reset operation.

    • getSecretKey

      @GetMapping("/secret-key/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getSecretKey(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Retrieve the secret key for a specific user identified by userId.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose secret key is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the user's secret key.
